department: Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
short_summary: Cours d'informatique au personnel des FAC et MDN
description: Cette annonce sollicite des demandes de proposition pour fournir les services d'enseignement des logiciels informatiques à des membres du personnel de la Forces Armées canadiennes à la 4e Escadre Cold Lake, en Alberta.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Notice Title and Solicitation Number

* **Title (English)**: W0134-22R008 - ADP Microsoft Computer Courses
* **Title (French)**: W0134-22R008 – Cours sur les produits Microsoft
* **Solicitation Number (English)**: S-3432-842791
* **Solicitation Number (French)**: S-3432-842791

### Tender Information

* **Tender Closing Date**: September 22, 2022 at 14:00 MDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: June 16, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date**: June 20, 2025
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Notice Type (French)**: Demande de propositions (DP)

### Service Description

* The requirement is to provide computer software training for personnel employed by the Department of National Defence (DND) and the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) at 4 Wing Cold Lake, Alberta.
* The subject matter is labor training or development (UNSPSC 80111504).

### Tender Status

* **Tender Status (English)**: Expired
* **Tender Status (French)**: Expiré

### Contractor Eligibility

* The tender is open to all qualified contractors.
* The selection criteria are lowest price.

### Trade Agreements

* The tender is available to contractors who are registered under the following trade agreements:
  * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Kristen Schultz
* Email: [kristen.schultz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristen.schultz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Attachments and Notice URL

* No attachments are provided.
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14003355?extsite=MTQwMDMzNTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: This rewritten entry maintains the essential information found in the original text. It adheres to good formatting practices and ensures that both English and French information are present
